title: Ryze nocturn thoery!
body: Ok listen the major belief is that nocturne is zed But in the cinematic a twist of fate Nocturne and Ryze are fighting and in Ryzes lore it states that Ryzes scroll is indestructible but Nocturn's blade clearly slices thought it  and in Ryzes lore it also states that the scroll contains unspeakable evil what if Ryze accidentally unleashed nocturne in his travels?

replies.body: yeah but you forgot the rengar ult as well after the fight with jax to boot
but according to cinematics it only takes a leona ult and not even a full ahri combo to take down a darius. wot
if you have a different opinion or have a question feel free to ask
